data.title: The Biggest 2023 Video Game Anniversaries List
data.meta_description: The biggest and best 2023 video game and gaming anniversaries. Mario Bros, Pokemon, Zelda, Grand Theft Auto, Call of Duty and more!
data.text:
A new year, a fresh new list of 2023 video game anniversaries – key milestones for us to celebrate how far we’ve come in gaming. Whether it’s Nintendo brawlers or iconic monster-catching RPGs, arcade boxing games or comic-crossovers, there’s plenty of celebrate in 2023!

If you create content, hopefully this 2023 gaming anniversaries list will help you plan your gaming blogs, streams, YouTube videos, photos TikTok and more!

Share our 2023 gaming anniversaries list

Find this list of 2023 video game anniversaries helpful for your content plans? Please share the list on social – it takes a massive amount of work to compile these (there is a lot of contradictory dates out there). Hope you find it helpful!

January

Let’s start this 2023 gaming anniversaries list with what’s happening in January. We’ve got the 25th anniversary of the awesome Capcom brawler Marvel vs. Capcom, celebrations for iconic games like Resident Evil 2 and Super Smash Bros. Brawl and more recent critically acclaimed gems like Celeste.

01/01 “E For Everyone” rating introduced 25th 02/01 Wasteland (MULTI) 35th 03/01 Rune Factory 2: A Fantasy Harvest Moon (DS) 15th 05/01 Robotron 64 (N64) 25th 08/01 Sonic Riders: Zero Gravity (MULTI) 15th 12/01 Marvel vs. Capcom (ARC) 25th 14/01 Konami Wai Wai World (FAMICOM) 35th 14/01 SimCity 4 (PC) 20th 15/01 DmC: Devil May Cry (MULTI) 10th 19/01 The Getaway (PS2) 20th 21/01 Ice Hockey (FAMICOM) 35th 21/01 Resident Evil 2 (PS1) – US Release 25th 21/01 Advance Wars: Days of Ruin (DS) 15th 22/01 Dead or Alive Xtreme Beach Volleyball (XBOX) 20th 22/01 Burnout Paradise (MULTI) 15th 22/01 The Cave (MULTI) 10th 25/01 Devil May Cry 2 (PS2) 20th 25/01 Celeste (MULTI) 5th 26/01 Black & Bruised (MULTI) 20th 26/01 Monster Hunter: World (MULTI) 5th 26/01 Dragon Ball FighterZ (MULTI) 5th 29/01 Bomberman World (PS1) 25th 29/01 Bust a Groove (PS1) 25th 29/01 Panzer Dragoon Saga (SAT) 25th 31/01 Gex: Enter the Gecko (MULTI) – EU Release 25th 31/01 Super Smash Bros. Brawl (Wii) – JP Release 15th 31/01 Devil May Cry 4 (MULTI) 15th Jan Apple Iie computer released 40th

February

There’s a lot to love in February’s list of 2023 gaming anniversaries – including the 10th anniversary (somehow) of top games like Dead Space 3 and Fire Emblem Awakening. Older milestones include the 20th of the Game Boy Advance SP in Japan and the 40th of Punch-Out!! All topped off with Star Fox celebrating 30 years.

01/02 Enduro (ATARI) 40th 04/02 Sins of a Solar Empire (PC) 15th 04/02 Fire Emblem Awakening (3DS) 10th 05/02 Turok remake (MULTI) 15th 05/02 Dead Space 3 (MULTI) 10th 06/02 Shadow of the Colossus – remake (PS4) 5th 10/02 Dragon Quest III (FAMICOM) 35th 10/02 R.C. Pro-Am (NES) 35th 11/02 Xenogears (PS1) 25th 14/02 Game Boy Advance SP released in Japan 20th 14/02 Final Fantasy Tactics Advance (GBA) 20th 16/02 Bayonetta 2 (SWITCH) 5th 17/02 Punch-Out!! (ARC) 40th 19/02 Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell (MULTI) 20th 19/02 Crysis 3 (MULTI) 10th 19/02 Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance (MULTI) 10th 20/02 Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne (PS2) 20th 21/02 Star Fox (SNES) – JP release 30th 24/02 Gex: Enter the Gecko (PS1) 25th 26/02 Burning Rangers (SAT) 25th 26/02 Tenchu: Stealth Assassins (PS1) 25th 26/02 X-Men vs. Street Fighter: EX Edition (PS1) 25th 26/02 Etrian Odyssey IV: Legends of the Titan (3DS) 10th 28/02 1080° Snowboarding (N64) – JP release 25th 28/02 Battlezone (PC) 25th 28/02 Star Wars: Rebellion (PC) 25th Feb Star Wars: X-Wing (MULTI) 30th

March

The 2023 video game anniversary celebrations continue as we head into Spring with the 30th anniversary of Kirby’s Adventure and the 20th of games like Pokemon Ruby and Sapphire and Zelda: The Wind Waker.

01/03 Gods and Generals (PC) 20th 03/03 Tenchu: Wrath of Heaven (PS2) 20th 04/03 God of War: Chains of Olympus (PSP) 15th 05/03 Castlevania: Lords of Shadow – Mirror of Fate (3DS) 10th 09/03 Wario Land II (GB) 25th 09/03 Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc (MULTI) 20th 09/03 Sonic Advance 2 (GBA) 20th 09/03 Super Smash Bros. Brawl (Wii) – US Release 15th 12/03 God of War: Ascension – PS3 10th 14/03 Mario Bros. (GAME & WATCH) 40th 16/03 Astron Belt (ARC) 40th 18/03 Batman: Dark Tomorrow (MULTI) 20th 19/03 Pokémon Ruby and Sapphire (GBA) – US Release 20th 19/03 The Walking Dead: Survival Instinct (MULTI) 10th 20/03 Luigi’s Mansion: Dark Moon (3DS) 10th 23/03 Kirby’s Adventure (NES) 30th 24/03 The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker (GC) – US Release 20th 24/03 Pokémon Mystery Dungeon: Gates to Infinity (3DS) 10th 25/03 Need for Speed III: Hot Pursuit (MULTI) 25th 26/03 BioShock Infinite (MULTI) 10th 27/03 Soulcalibur II (MULTI) – JP/console release 20th 27/03 Far Cry 5 (MULTI) 5th 29/03 Parasite Eve (PS1) 25th 31/03 StarCraft (PC) 25th Mar Gyruss (ARC) 40th Mar Nobunaga’s Ambition (MULTI) 40th

April

April is quite a light month in our 2023 video game anniversary highlights, with the 40th anniversary of the original arcade Mario Bros. game (not to be confused with Super Mario Bros.), the 30th birthday of graphics gurus Nvidia and the 20th anniversary of the merging of RPG giants Square and Enix.

01/04 The 7th Guest (MUTLI) 30th 01/04 Square and Enix merge to form Square Enix 20th 04/04 Mario Bros. (ARC) 40th 05/04 Nvidia founded 30th 07/04 Warhammer: Dark Omen (PS1) 25th 09/04 Guacamelee! (MULTI) 10th 13/04 Postal 2 (PC) 20th 14/04 Nintendo releases GameBoy Light in Japan 25th 14/04 Golden Sun: The Lost Age (GBA) 20th 16/04 Injustice: Gods Among Us (MULTI) 10th 17/04 Puyo Puyo Sun (PC) 25th 20/04 God of War (PS4) 5th 20/04 Nintendo Labo (SWITCH) 5th 25/04 Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade (GBA) – JP Release 20th 28/04 Tecmo Cup Soccer Game (NES) 35th 29/04 Super Tempo (SAT) 25th 29/04 NBA Street Vol. 2 (MULTI) 20th 29/04 Grand Theft Auto IV (MULTI) 15th 30/04 Bomberman Hero (N64) 25th Apr Keystone Kapers (ATARI) 40th Apr Assault (ARC) 35th Apr NBA Jam (ARC) 30th

May

May is another quiet month in the calendar with a few key milestones – namely 25th anniversaries for a pair of gaming/industry awards, the 20th anniversary of Silent Hill 3 and WarioWare on the GBA.

05/05 Star Wars (ARC) 40th 06/05 Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow (GBA) 20th 07/05 Jazz Jackrabbit 2 (PC) 25th 14/05 Enter The Matrix (MULTI) 20th 14/05 Metro: Last Light (MULTI) 10th 20/05 Rise of Nations (PC) 20th 21/05 Baroque (SAT) 25th 21/05 WarioWare Inc.: Mega Microgame$ (GBA) 20th 22/05 Unreal (PC) 25th 23/05 Silent Hill 3 (PS2) 20th 27/05 Brute Force (PC) 20th 28/05 Radiant Silvergun (ARC) 25th May Sega Laserdisc arcade hardware 40th May Bravoman (ARC) 35th May First Game Critics Awards held at E3 25th May First D.I.C.E. Awards launched 25th May Wetrix (N64) – EU Release 25th

June

Heading into the summer months and our 2023 gaming anniversaries list is absolutely bursting full of awesome games – including Zelda: Link’s Awakening turning 30, Animal Crossing: New Leaf and The Last of Us turning 10 and a mammoth milestone for Donkey Kong 3 which turns 40 in 2023. It’s also the 25th celebration of bear and bird with Banjo-Kazooie turning 25.

01/06 Sonic Pinball Party (GBA) 20th 05/06 State of Decay (MULTI) 10th 08/06 WWF Royal Rumble (MULTI) 30th 06/06 Syndicate (MULTI) 30th 06/06 The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening (GB) 30th 09/06 My Pokémon Ranch (Wii) 15th 09/06 Animal Crossing: New Leaf (3DS) 10th 11/06 Spy Hunter (ARC) 40th 12/06 Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots (PS3) 15th 13/06 Civilization Revolution (MULTI) 15th 14/06 Altered Beast (ARC) 35th 14/06 The Last of Us (MULTI) 10th 16/06 MSX computer released in Japan 40th 17/06 Blaster Master (NES) 35th 19/06 Dragon’s Lair (ARC) 40th 19/06 Donkey Kong 3 (ARC) 40th 20/06 Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness (PS2) 20th 20/06 Wario World (GC) 20th 20/06 Alone in the Dark (MULTI) 15th 22/06 Mario Tennis Aces (SWITCH) 5th 24/06 Pole Position II (ARC) 40th 24/06 Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising (GBA) 20th 24/06 Mega Man Battle Network 3 (GBA) 20th 25/06 Day of the Tentacle (MULTI) 30th 25/06 Ouya console released 10th 26/06 Viewtiful Joe (GC) 20th 29/06 Banjo-Kazooie (N64) – US Release 25th 29/06 Street Fighter Alpha 3 (ARC) 25th 30/06 Deathtrap Dungeon (MULTI) 25th 30/06 Deep Fear (SAT) 25th 30/06 Ape Escape 2 (PS2) 20th Jun The Portopia Serial Murder Case (PC) 40th Jun Pool of Radiance (MULTI) 35th

July

Another packed month with the likes of games like Persona 4 and Pikmin 3 having key milestones, as well as some older greats like F-Zero X and Super Mario All-Stars having their spotlight in the 2023 gaming anniversaries list.

04/07 Heart of Darkness (PS1) – EU Release 25th 07/07 Samurai Shodown (ARC) 30th 08/07 Crystal Castles (ARC) 40th 08/07 Planetfall (MULTI) 40th 09/07 Dota 2 (PC) 10th 10/07 Persona 4 (PS2) – JP Release 15th 13/07 Pikmin 3 (Wii U) 10th 13/07 Octopath Traveler (SWITCH) 5th 14/07 Super Mario All-Stars (SNES) 30th 14/07 F-Zero X (N64) – JP release 25th 15/07 Nintendo releases Famicom in Japan 40th 15/07 Sega SG-1000 console released in Japan 40th 15/07 Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic (PC) 20th 16/07 Brave Fencer Musashi (PS1) 25th 22/07 Kid Kool (NES) 35th 24/07 Wario Land: The Shake Dimension (Wii) 15th 25/07 F-Zero GX (GC) – JP Release 20th 25/07 Dragon’s Crown (MULTI) 10th 29/07 Soulcalibur IV (MULTI) 15th 30/07 Star Ocean: The Second Story (PS1) 25th 30/07 Soulcalibur (ARC) 25th 31/07 Urban Assault (PC) 25th 31/07 Iggy’s Reckin’ Balls (N64) 25th 31/07 Rhythm Heaven (DS) – JP Release 20th 31/07 Nvidia Shield Portable released 10th July Bomberman (MULTI) 40th July Märchen Maze (ARC) 35th July Nintendo Power – first issue released 35th

August

Leaping into battle action in August with the anniversary of the original Japanese Pokemon Stadium and RPG great Secret of Mana turning 30. The month is a bit of a quieter one for the 2023 video game anniversaries, but we do celebrate 10 years since Rayman Legends launched.

01/08 Pokémon Stadium / JP original (N64) 25th 06/08 Secret of Mana (SNES) 30th 06/08 Wachenröder (SAT) 25th 07/08 Pro Evolution Soccer 3 (PS2) 20th 07/08 Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon (DS) 15th 07/08 Tales of Vesperia (XBOX) 15th 07/08 Dead Cells (MULTI) 5th 08/08 Spelunky (PC) 10th 08/08 Papers, Please (PC/MAC) 10th 12/08 Professor Pac-Man (ARC) 40th 13/08 Jr. Pac-Man (ARC) 40th 14/08 Monster Rancher 4 (PS2) 20th 15/08 The Activision Decathlon (ATARI) 40th 21/08 Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six (PC) 25th 21/08 Ratchet & Clank Future: Quest for Booty (PS3) 15th 22/08 Inazuma Eleven (DS) 15th 23/08 Ultima III: Exodus (APPLE) 40th 28/08 Donut County (MULTI) 5th 29/08 Rayman Legends (MULTI) 10th Aug Bakutotsu Kijūtei (ARC) 35th

September

We really start to ramp up the celebrations after the summer break with Metal Gear Solid and Spyro the Dragon turning 25, it’s also the quarter century celebration for Pokemon Yellow and 15 years since Pokemon Platinum hit Japan. The Simpsons: Hit & Run also turns 15 in August. It’ll be 10 years since Grand Theft Auto V hit the streets, too!

03/09 Metal Gear Solid (PS1) – JP Release 25th 04/09 Dune 2000 (PC) 25th 06/09 French gaming channel Game One launched 25th 07/09 Spider-Man (PS4) 5th 09/09 Cyberball (ARC) 35th 10/09 Gunstar Heroes (MD/GEN) 30th 10/09 Spyro the Dragon (PS1) 25th 10/09 Banjo-Kazooie: Grunty’s Revenge (GBA) 20th 12/09 Pokémon Yellow (GB) – JP release 25th 12/09 Steam service launched 20th 13/09 Pokémon Platinum (DS) – JP release 15th 14/09 Operation Thunderbolt (ARC) 35th 14/09 Rock Band 2 (MULTI) 15th 15/09 Walt Disney Computer Software founded 35th 16/09 Amiga CD32 released in the EU 30th 16/09 The Simpsons: Hit & Run (MULTI) 20th 16/09 Crysis Warhead (PC) 15th 16/09 Star Wars: The Force Unleashed (MULTI) 15th 17/09 Grand Theft Auto V (MULTI) 10th 20/09 The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker HD (Wii U) 10th 22/09 De Blob (MULTI) 15th 22/09 Kirby Super Star Ultra (DS) 15th 22/09 Mega Man 9 (Wii) 15th 23/09 Sonic CD (SEGA CD) 30th 23/09 Lego Batman: The Video Game (MULTI) 15th 25/09 Disaster: Day of Crisis (Wii) 15th 26/09 Zelda II: The Adventure of Link (NES) – EU release 35th 26/09 Dance Dance Revolution (ARC) 25th 30/09 Knight Rider (NES) 35th 30/09 Take-Two Interactive founded 30th 30/09 Body Harvest (N64) 25th 30/09 Delta Force (PC) 25th 30/09 Caesar III (PC) 25th 30/09 Duke Nukem: Time to Kill (PS1) 25th 30/09 Silent Hill: Homecoming (MULTI) 15th 30/09 Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood (DS) 15th Sep Track & Field (ARC) 40th Sep King’s Quest IV 35th Sep Family Computer Network System released in Japan 35th Sep Zombies Ate My Neighbors (SNES) 30th

October

October is another chunky month in our 2023 video game anniversaries line-up, with the 35th anniversary of Super Mario Bros. 2, plus the 10th since Nintendo released the 2DS and Pokemon X and Y. The Game Boy Colour also has a milestone, celebrating 25 years in 2023.

01/10 MediEvil (PS1) 25th 02/10 Forza Horizon 4 (XBONE) 5th 04/10 3DO console released in the US 30th 05/10 Ghouls ‘n Ghosts (ARC) 35th 05/10 Assassin’s Creed Odyssey (MULTI) 5th 05/10 Super Mario Party (SWITCH) 5th 07/10 Nokia release N-Gage console 20th 07/10 Crash: Mind over Mutant (MULTI) 15th 08/10 Beyond: Two Souls (MULTI) 10th 09/10 Super Mario Bros. 2 (NES) – US release 35th 10/10 Link: The Faces of Evil (Cdi) 30th 12/10 Nintendo releases 2DS Console 10th 12/10 Pokémon X and Y (3DS) 10th 12/10 Call of Duty: Black Ops 4 5th 13/10 Dead Space (MULTI) 15th 13/10 The Stanley Parable (PC) 10th 14/10 Celebrity Deathmatch (MULTI) 20th 14/10 Jak II (PS2) 20th 14/10 Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne (MULTI) 20th 16/10 Wii Music (Wii) 15th 20/10 SSX 3 (MULTI) 20th 21/10 Nintendo releases Game Boy Color released in Japan 25th 21/10 Turok 2: Seeds of Evil (N64) 25th 21/10 Fable II 15th 21/10 Far Cry 2 (MULTI) 15th 21/10 Spider-Man: Web of Shadows (MULTI) 15th 21/10 The Legend of Spyro: Dawn of the Dragon (MULTI) 15th 23/10 Super Mario Bros. 3 (NES) – Japan release 35th 26/10 Red Dead Redemption 2 (MULTI) 5th 27/10 Tony Hawk’s Underground (MULTI) 20th 27/10 LittleBigPlanet (PS3) 15th 28/10 Grim Fandango (PC) 25th 28/10 Top Spin (XBOX) 20th 28/10 Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (MULTI) 20th 28/10 Fallout 3 (MULTI) 20th 29/10 Sega Mega Drive (Genesis) released in Japan 35th 29/10 Castlevania: Rondo of Blood (PC) 30th 29/10 Fallout 2 (PC) 30th 29/10 Assassin’s Creed IV: Black Flag (MULTI) 10th 30/10 Ridge Racer (ARC) 30th 31/10 Age of Empires: The Rise of Rome (PC) 25th 31/10 Glover (MULTI) 25th 31/10 Crash Bandicoot: Warped (PS1) 25th 31/10 Oddworld: Abe’s Exoddus (MULTI) 25th Oct Virtua Fighter (ARC) 30th

November

November is another huge month for anniversaries, with the Mario Kart: Double Dash and Beyond Good & Evil turning 20. There’s also the 15th anniversary of Sonic Unleashed and the iconic Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time will be turning 25 in 2023.

07/11 Mario Kart: Double Dash (GC) 20th 07/11 Gears of War 2 (X360) 15th 09/11 SiN (PC) 25th 11/11 Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando (PS2) 20th 11/11 Disney’s Aladdin (MD/GEN) 30th 11/11 Beyond Good & Evil (MULTI) 20th 11/11 Crash Nitro Kart (MULTI) 20th 11/11 Medal of Honor: Rising Sun (MULTI) 20th 11/11 Call of Duty: World at War (MULTI) 15th 11/11 Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3 (MULTI) 15th 13/11 Spyro Reignited Trilogy (MULTI) 5th 15/11 ClayFighter (SNES) 30th 15/11 Sony releases PlayStation 4 10th 16/11 Animal Crossing: City Folk (Wii) 15th 16/11 Mortal Kombat vs. DC Universe (MULTI) 15th 16/11 Pokémon: Let’s Go (SWITCH) 5th 17/11 Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga (GBA) 20th 18/11 Project Gotham Racing 2 (XBOX) 20th 18/11 Final Fantasy X-2 (PS2) 20th 18/11 Metal Arms: Glitch in the System (MULTI) 20th 18/11 Left 4 Dead (MULTI) 15th 18/11 Need for Speed: Undercover (MULTI) 15th 18/11 Sonic Unleashed (MULTI) 15th 18/11 Tomb Raider: Underworld (MULTI) 15th 19/11 Half-Life (PC) 25th 19/11 Manhunt (PS2) 20th 20/11 The Settlers III (MULTI) 25th 20/11 Tomb Raider III (MULTI) 25th 20/11 Battlefield V (MULTI) 5th 21/11 The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time (N64) 25th 21/11 Super Mario 3D World (Wii U) 10th 22/11 Microsoft releases Xbox One console 10th 22/11 The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds (3DS) 10th 22/11 Dead Rising 3 (XBONE) 10th 23/11 Atari Jaguar released in the US 30th 25/11 Blood II: The Chosen (PC) 25th 26/11 Dr. Robotnik’s Mean Bean Machine (MD/GEN) 30th 27/11 Sega launches Dreamcast in Japan 25th Nov Double Dragon II: The Revenge (Arc) 35th Nov Splatterhouse (ARC) 35th Nov Phantasy Star – EU/US Release 35th Nov Mortal Kombat II (ARC) 30th Nov Sam & Max Hit the Road (PC) 30th

December

We wrap up 2023 with a few key releases, including the 30th birthday for Doom. Sonic Adventure and Mario Party are also turning 25 in December, joined by Rockstar Games which also celebrates a quarter of a century developing games.

01/12 1080° Avalanche (GC) 20th 01/12 Thief: The Dark Project (PC) 25th 02/12 Deus Ex: Invisible War (MULTI) 20th 03/12 Star Wars: Rogue Squadron (PC) 25th 03/12 Sony releases PlayStation Classic 5th 04/12 Magic and Mayhem (PC) 25th 07/12 First US senate hearing on video games 35th 07/12 Super Smash Bros. Ultimate (SWITCH) 5th 09/12 Ninja Gaiden (ARC) 35th 10/12 Xevious (ARC) 40th 10/12 Doom (PC) 30th 12/12 Hey You, Pikachu! (N64) 25th 17/12 Final Fantasy II (Famicom) 35th 17/12 Gabriel Knight: Sins of the Fathers (MULTI) 30th 17/12 Mega Man X (SNES) 30th 17/12 Phantasy Star IV (MD/GEN) 30th 18/12 Mario Party (N64) – JP Release 25th 18/12 Pokémon Trading Card Game (GBC) 25th 18/12 StarCraft: Brood War (PC) 25th 21/12 Baldur’s Gate (PC) 25th 23/12 Sonic Adventure (DC) – JP Release 25th 24/12 Mega Man 2 (NES) 35th 24/12 Flipnote Studio (DS) 15th Dec Winning Run (ARC) 35th Dec Namco System 21 – 3D arcade polygon board 35th Dec Rockstar Games founded 25th
